name: CARZ Brain Training
description:
Ideal game for daily brain training!
This is a puzzle game that you can play steadily with very simple operation.

[How to play]
If you can take the red car out of the parking lot, then your game will be cleared.
You can move any car that's blocking your way to the left/ right or move them up/ down to prepare your way out.

There are both easy stages and difficult stages.
If you don't know how to move, just use your hints!

[Stage]

There are 10 levels.
Each level includes 60 stages, which gradually getting more and more difficult.

The stage that seems easy at first may turn out very difficult or vice versace...
Various kinds of stage will stimulate your intellectual curiosity to the max.

So, try it!
